com.facebook.buck.rules

Interface AbstractBuildRuleBuilderParams

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    FakeAbstractBuildRuleBuilderParams

    public interface AbstractBuildRuleBuilderParams
    Context object that is passed to an AbstractBuildRuleBuilder constructor.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Function<String,String> getPathRelativizer()
      A function that maps a path relative to the project root to an absolute path.

    • Method Detail

      • getPathRelativizer

        Function<String,String> getPathRelativizer()
        A function that maps a path relative to the project root to an absolute path.

        This is likely backed by a ProjectFilesystem, but we expose only this function, as it makes it easier to create a fake AbstractBuildRuleBuilderParams for testing that could be implemented by Functions.identity().
